articles.author: Michael McAleer
articles.content:
Canadian health officials say they are to stop offering AstraZeneca's Covid-19 vaccine to people under age 55 and require a new analysis of the shot's risks and benefits based on age and gender.
The… [+3757 chars]
articles.description: Canadian health officials say they are to stop offering AstraZeneca's Covid-19 vaccine to people under age 55 and require a new analysis of the shot's risks and benefits based on age and gender.The moves follow reports from Europe of rare but serious blood cl…
articles.title: Canada pauses AstraZeneca Covid-19 vaccine use for those under 55 - BreakingNews.ie
